alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 4:06AM CDT until March 29 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. For the Yellow River...including Necedah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is expected to continue. * WHERE...Yellow River at Necedah. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 15.5 feet and fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
